name: mermaid salon - Mermaid SPA & Makeover
description: This game introduces you in the amazing water world, where you'll met the most beautiful mermaid princess. And now she reveals her beauty secrets to you. In the first part of the game you'll see how she relaxes at the spa salon. Then go through some simple makeup steps. In the third part of the game discover her amazing wardrobe and dress her up as you like. Now she looks gorgeous isn't it?
